ygData.subject: Re: Problems setting up hyperNEAT 2.6
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm that s strange because earlier I had different errors telling me it couldn t find those libraries. But that was because bjam built the libraries with

Hmm that's strange because earlier I had different errors telling me it co=
uldn't find those libraries. But that was because bjam built the libraries =
with visual studio 2010 and the libraries had a different name because of t=
hat.

As for now, I have a folder C:/minimaster/lib/boost_1_45_0/stage/lib =
where all kinds of .lib files are in. Like libboost_math_c99_vc90-mt-gd-1_4=
5.lib

In cmake i'm correctly referring to 
BOOST_ROOT: C:/minimaster/lib/b=
oost_1_45_0
BOOST_STAGE:C:/minimaster/lib/boost_1_45_0/stage/lib 

I ran th=
e bootstrap.bat in the boost root map and then ran bjam.


This is a screen=
shot of my hyperneat cmake screen
http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/1848/cmake=
.png

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "jgmath2000" <jgmath2000@...> wrote:
>
>=
 That means it isn't finding your boost libraries.
> 
> Make sure the BOOST=
_STAGE cmake variable contains the path which has all of your boost lib fil=
es.
>
